department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Remove existing concrete dam structure and contaminated soil, restore natural stream, and undertake associated site restoration.
description: The project involves the removal of an existing concrete dam structure and contaminated soil at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) St. John's Research and Development Centre (RDC) in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador. The site will then be restored to its original state. Consultancy services are required to prepare construction documents for this work. All interested consultants may submit a proposal.
duration_in_months: After 30 days of contract signing, the project duration is expected to be approximately six (6) months.
full_summary:
## RFP - Flings Brook Dam Decommissioning – Design
### Reference Number
WS4538460565-Doc4538499745
### Solicitation Category
Design Services for Dam Decommissioning
### Brief Description
This Request for Proposal is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC). The project involves the removal of an existing concrete dam structure and contaminated soil at the AAFC St. John’s Research and Development Centre in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador. The PSPC seeks proposals from consultants for professional services to prepare construction documents for this work.

### Region
The project is located in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.
### Trade Agreements
Proposals are invited from all eligible consultants who are able to comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the bid solicitation.

### Requirements
* Prepare construction documents for the decommissioning of the existing concrete dam structure and restoration of the natural stream.
* All interested consultants may submit a proposal for the required professional services.

### Contact Information

For more information about the bid solicitation, please contact:
Rachel Miller, Contracting Authority 
Email: [rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  
### Submission Instructions
All proposals must be submitted via SAP Ariba by [2024-05-28T14:00:00][ tendertClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture ]] at the latest. Please see the project details on the [ Ariba platform ][noticeURL-URLavis-eng] for more information.

### Language
Both English and French will be accepted.

### Attachment
There is no attachment for this solicitation.

### Note for Bidders
All proposals must be submitted according to the guidelines outlined in the solicitation package. If you experience any technical difficulties, please contact the Ariba support centre. Please note that bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the contracting authority within 15 working days from the date of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
